sites.title: 新片场
sites.author: 革奴
sites.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/89.0.4389.90 Mobile Safari/537.36

searchMovieRule.title: ul.video-list div.video-con div.video-con-top a p&&text
searchMovieRule.subTitle: ul.video-list div.video-con div.video-con-top div.new-cate span&&text
searchMovieRule.jumpUrl: js:function generateValues(documentContent){const htmlContent=$base64.decode(documentContent);const elements=$browser.selectForArray(htmlContent,"ul.video-list li.enter-filmplay&&data-articleid");const resultSet=[];for(var index in elements){resultSet.push("https://h5.xinpianchang.com/article/index.html?id="+elements[index])}return resultSet}

movieRule.title: div.video-con div.video-con-top a p&&text
movieRule.jumpUrl: js:function generateValues(documentContent){const htmlContent=$base64.decode(documentContent);const elements=$browser.selectForArray(htmlContent,"ul.video-list li.enter-filmplay&&data-articleid");const resultSet=[];for(var index in elements){resultSet.push("https://h5.xinpianchang.com/article/index.html?id="+elements[index])}return resultSet}
